definitions.title: adj.gent.
definitions.body: c. art. as subst. coll. (people of the city called simirra by As., COT:Gn Dl:Pa 281f., Egypt. Ḏa-(m)-ma-ra WMM:As. u. Eur. l87; Tel Am. sumur acc. to Zim:ZPV xiii (1890) 145 Jastr:JBL xii (1898), 63; Gk. ta\ Si/mura, etc., e.g.Strabo:xvi. 2, 12 >Wkl:MVG 1896, 203 f.,cf.Tel Am 40* thinks ´[[ח]], Si/mura, = As.Zimarra, distinct from Simirra-Ṣumur);—´[[הַצּ]] Ge 10:18 = 1Ch 1:16, LXX. to\n Samarai=on\ Ez Eze 27:11 Co rds. [[וּחְמָרִים]] for [[וְגַמָּדִים]] (q.v.); Toy Krae retain ´[[וְג]];—cf. mod. Ṣumra, N. of Tripoli and S. of Ruad (Arvad), v. Pietschm:Phön. 39 Bäd:Pal. 3 (1898), 407.
